"Qarqaa Ma'ana" Event
25  March,  2024
Best Buddies Qatar celebrated with its members from the citizen program, sponsored generously by Qatar National Bank, at the awareness corner in the Ramadan Bazaar on Pearl Island, showcasing the famous cultural heritage of "Qarqaa." More than 100 people visited the corner, and sweets were distributed to them by the members and sponsors from Qatar National Bank, creating a joyful atmosphere.
